AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia far planet child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a space station far from the stars, and to [PAWN_pronoun], the stars of [PAWN_possessive] home star system looked like nothing more than a bleak point. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught with the goal of being a pioneer, but [PAWN_pronoun] never gave up [PAWN_possessive] curiosity about that faint point of light.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia engineer's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by engineers family. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed early on to some of the common sense Celestias needed in asteroid and space engineering construction, and more importantly, a logical and rational way of thinking.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia firearms enthusiasts
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once thought to have some serious violent tendencies. But as it soon turned out, [PAWN_pronoun] was just extraordinarily curious about the mechanics of these murderous weapons - they had a singular purpose, but how did they achieve that purpose efficiently and quickly through those incredibly delicate mechanics? It completely satisfied [PAWN_possessive] curiosity.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia troubled child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is especially capable of getting into trouble, fighting with classmates, tearing down other people's stuff, and messing things up when [PAWN_pronoun] works with others. But [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't seem to want to do bad things, [PAWN_pronoun] just doesn't know how to express [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: celestia tactical objects
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has been involved in a special top secret Celestia military programme for as long as [PAWN_pronoun] can remember.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] showed [PAWN_possessive] outstanding tactical thinking and physical strength at an early age and was selected for such exceptional talent.Battlefield training, field command, close-quarters combat on space stations, and combat in extreme environments, all of which were trained only to select elite Celestia warriors.
